channel.title: I little bit of Guidance
channel.description:
Could someone please guide me in the right direction with client gameframes?
The thing is, I have a client, but I want to change the gameframe, because It's currently a 503 gameframe, and personally, I looks horrible, I've tried putting on a 474+ gameframe, but it just doesn't fit. The minimap is black, chatbox is screwed up etc. I was wondering which class file I would need to go into to fix this.

item.title: I little bit of Guidance
item.dc:creator: @K_Jay K Jay
item.description:
@K_Jay wrote:

U should contact someone who got experience in 503 sources. Try to look in section downlaods who made a 503 ore a 474.
-K Jay

Read full topic
